description: Whole roasted cauliflower cheese with a hint of luxurious truffle makes an impressive vegetarian main dish.
name: Truffle Cauliflower Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil and add the whole cauliflower. Simmer for 10 minutes and drain.

Heat the butter in a pan on medium heat and stir in the flour and mustard powder, mixing to make a paste. Remove from the heat, whisk in the milk slowly and place back on the hob. Cook, stirring all the time, until the sauce has thickened.

Stir in 3/4 of the cheddar and season with black pepper. Place the cauliflower upright in a baking dish and drizzle with truffle oil. Pour over the cheese sauce and remaining grated cheese and bake for 25-30 minutes until golden and bubbling.
Top with fresh chives and extra truffle oil and serve.
